instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-01814: What is 820-01814? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01814</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A turn on not charging.
threads.message:
hi, this came in with iquid damage at <CHIP>U3200</CHIP> and <CHIP>U3100</CHIP> area..
i replaced both <CHIP>U3200</CHIP> and <CHIP>U3100</CHIP>, now board will turn on, run off battery, but not charging at all port.
i measure that ub300 and ub400 got pp1v1 when plugged in to their corresponding port, but <CHIP>U3100</CHIP> and <CHIP>U3200</CHIP> doesnt get any pp1v1 at all.
i wonder maybe thats causing the not charging, any idea ? TIA

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01814</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A turn on not charging.
threads.message: The board runs with charger alone, connected to <CHIP>U3100</CHIP>/200 ports?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01814</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A turn on not charging.
threads.message:
no, board only turn on with battery.
if without battery, all 4port behave the same. only stuck at 5v 0.26amp..

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01814</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A turn on not charging.
threads.message:
That's the reason battery is not charging.
Need to fix USB-C problems first.

Compare diode mode readings around <CHIP>U3100</CHIP>/200 with UB300/400.
Probably some corroded resistors, or broken trace.
Also check <CHIP>U2890</CHIP> traces/solders and surrounding resistors.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01814</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A turn on not charging.
threads.message:
my bad, i wrongly use cd3215bo3, after i replace both <CHIP>U3200</CHIP> and <CHIP>U3100</CHIP> again with c00 version, now 4 port will switch to 20v, but still wont run just with charger.
if i boot it with battery, i plugged in charger, mac will detect theres charger connected, but battery isnt charging it say.

without battery, all 4 port behave the same, will switch to 20v, then fluctuate between 0.26-0.08amp..

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01814</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A turn on not charging.
threads.message: my bad, i use bo3 version instead of c00, replaced both of them, and all 4 can switch to 20v and its charging now, thanks a lot!
